rules.title: Poor Air Quality Alert
rules.message: Air quality has degraded to {aqi_level} level. AQI: {aqi}, PM2.5: {pm2_5} μg/m³. Consider limiting outdoor activities.

rules.title: Hazardous Air Quality Alert
rules.message: CRITICAL: Air quality is {aqi_level}. AQI: {aqi}, PM2.5: {pm2_5} μg/m³. Avoid outdoor activities and close windows.

rules.title: System Overheating
rules.message: Pi Air Monitor system is overheating. CPU temperature: {cpu_temp}°C. Check ventilation and cooling.

rules.title: Air Quality Sensor Failure
rules.message: The air quality sensor has stopped responding or encountered an error. Manual intervention may be required.
